```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(statcalpolypackage)
```


```{r}
types = str_remove(colnames(mmm_stock_data), "mmm_")[-1]
for(y_type in types) {
  print( # wrap the ggplot code inside print() for a loop
    mmm_stock_data %>%
    ggplot(aes_string(x="stock_date", y=paste0("mmm_", y_type))) +
    geom_point() + 
    theme_bw()
  )
}

```

```{r}
types2 = str_remove(colnames(netflix_stock_data), "nflx_")[-1]
for(y_type in types2) {
  print(
    ggplot(netflix_stock_data, aes_string(x="stock_date", y=paste0("nflx_", y_type))) +
    geom_point() + 
    theme_bw()
  )
}
```
